page.title: 03INDUSTRY
page.content: The major part of industry is related to warehousing and the storage of goods.Ross Foods and Coca Cola are based on the Walsall Road.The container base on the College Road is one of six inland ports based in this country. Goods are cleared here by customs ready for shipping abroad or distribution in the U.K.The base employs about 200 local people and deals with approx.250 lorries a day.There are two Karricons;these are used for lifting the containers off the lorries in order to stack them before processing.Goods ranging from sewing needles to London taxis are shipped to all parts of the world from this port.A small part of this port is used for the storage of new cars ready for export.Other firms are Unigate Dairies,Harris Dry Cleaners,Mellerware and Douglas Construction.
